item.description: Karrie and Suzanne will be hosting the meeting at the Stafford Downtown Firehouse #245 - 27 Willington ave, Stafford Springs, CT 06076. It has a full kitchen and table and chairs. Upstairs- we can have the meeting in comfy oversized recliners --perfect for all of us. Menu will be 5 alarm chili hot dogs or chili burgers, and chili french fries. Bring your own TUMS! Contributions of appetizers, rolls, dessert, and drinks are welcome. Start time is 7:00.
item.why: This is your chance to help us plan our calendar of upcoming events!
item.name: Dinner and a Meeting
